meanings.definition: To treat too much or excessively.
meanings.sent1: She overtreats her dog with too many treats.
meanings.sent2: The dentist warns that overtreats can harm your teeth.
meanings.sent3: He always overtreats his plants with water, thinking they need more than they do.
meanings.sent4: The chef overtreats the dish with salt, making it almost inedible.
meanings.sent5: The teacher overtreats her students with praise, making them expect rewards for every little thing.

meanings.definition: The act of treating too much or excessively.
meanings.sent1: His overtreats of gifts to his girlfriend make her uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The overtreats of medication can lead to negative side effects.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of overtreats, with too much food and decorations everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her overtreats of kindness towards strangers always brighten their day.
meanings.sent5: The overtreats of attention from the fans overwhelmed the celebrity.
